snippet: Attacks over the past two days killed five people across the country, officials said Monday.
abstract: Afghan officials say attacks over past two days killed five people across the country.
lead_paragraph: Attacks over the past two days killed five people across the country, officials said Monday.

headline.main: Afghanistan: A Provincial Official Is Among 5 People Killed in Attacks
